summary: In Greek mythology, Agamemnon was a powerful king who led the Greek army against Troy. He was the king of Mycenae and Argos, and the brother of Menelaus. Agamemnon was married to Clytemnestra, and they had several children. After the Trojan War, he was murdered by his wife, or sometimes said to be killed by her lover, Aegisthus. Agamemnon's story is a tragic one, filled with family drama and betrayal.
title: Agamemnon
